response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would greatly benefit your endeavors. We are offering this remarkable item at a special price of $950,000, which we hope will be more appealing than the market value to you. This offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and the potential synergy between our product and your business objectives. Should you decide to proceed, we are confident it will be a mutually beneficial arrangement. We look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
